entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tulita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:56 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -40.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tulita Airport 03:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -40.2°C
Pressure: 104.1 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -44.0°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 43. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Ice fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 12:16 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 12:16 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:16 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
